assumes.post_str: The undersigned is directed to pay that with effect from 28th August 1994 Shri Minister of State (Independent charge) of the Ministry of Labour assumed temporarily the additional charge of the office of the Minister of State (Independent charge) of the Ministry of Coal and will hold the charge till Shri who has gone abroad for medical treatment resumes his duties
